metadata.description: Skills for Agentic Intelligence - specialized capabilities for development workflows

plugins.name: ai-daily-digest
plugins.description: Daily AI news digest covering technical advances, business news, and engineering impact

plugins.name: browser-controller
plugins.description: Programmatic control of Chrome/Firefox via CDP/Marionette

plugins.name: gh-review-comments
plugins.description: List, reply to, resolve, and create GitHub PR review comment threads

plugins.name: git
plugins.description: Git workflow automation: worktree creation with context transfer, branch cleanup, and reset utilities

plugins.name: humanize
plugins.description: Make text sound natural by removing AI writing patterns

plugins.name: manage-agent
plugins.description: Create, modify, or transform subagent definitions with quality validation

plugins.name: manage-plan
plugins.description: Investigate codebases and produce implementation plans

plugins.name: ocr-finder
plugins.description: Find text in images using EasyOCR and return click coordinates

plugins.name: review-agent
plugins.description: Audit subagent definitions for quality compliance

plugins.description: Audit and fix CLAUDE.md files using tiered binary checklist

plugins.name: review-skill
plugins.description: Review and fix Claude Code skill definitions using tiered binary checklist

plugins.name: screen-recorder
plugins.description: Record macOS screen with verification and format conversion

plugins.description: Capture session context for continuity between Claude Code sessions

plugins.name: space-finder
plugins.description: Find and switch macOS Spaces by application name

plugins.description: Inspect live macOS UI elements via Accessibility API

plugins.name: web-automation
